alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:33AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible in the foothills of the Uintas. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times. Snow and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times, especially in open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
